versos: (victuals) 1 Samuel 30:12 - And they gave him a piece of a cake of figs
(escaped) 1 Samuel 30:17 - "David fought them from dusk until the evening of the next day, and none of them got away, except four hundred young men who rode off on camels and fled.";;;
(eshcol) Numbers 13:24 - That place was called the Valley of eshcol because of the cluster of grapes the Israelites cut off there.;;;
(captive) 2 Corinthians 10:5 - We destroy arguments and every lofty opinion raised against the knowledge of God
(armed) 2 Corinthians 10:4 - "The weapons we fight with are not the weapons of the world. On the contrary, they have divine power to demolish strongholds.";;;
(pursued) Psalm 23:6 - "Surely your goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the Lord forever.";;;
(damascus) Acts 9:3 - As he neared damascus on his journey
(women) "And the angel answered and said unto the women, Fear not ye: for I know that ye seek Jesus, which was crucified." - Matthew 28:5;;;
(valley) Psalm 23:4 - Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.;;;
(joy) Psalm 16:11 - You make known to me the path of life; you will fill me with joy in your presence, with eternal pleasures at your right hand.;;;
(vision) Proverbs 29:18 - "Where there is no vision, the people perish: but he that keepeth the law, happy is he.";;;
(shield) Psalm 28:7 - "The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.";;;

(seeing) Jeremiah 32:4 - "Zedekiah king of Judah will not escape the Babylonians but will certainly be given into the hands of the king of Babylon, and will speak with him face to face and see him with his own eyes.";;;
(eliezer) Genesis 15:2 - But Abram said, "Sovereign Lord, what can you give me since I remain childless and the one who will inherit my estate is eliezer of Damascus";;;
(bowels) Philippians 1:8 - "For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.";;;
(inherit) Ephesians 1:11 - "In him we were also chosen, having been predestined according to the plan of him who works out everything in conformity with the purpose of his will,";;;
